mapper.sql: id, user_id, fund_code, total_shares, available_shares, frozen_shares, avg_cost_price, total_cost, cost_principal, last_updated
mapper.select: select s.id, s.user_id, u.user_name as user_name, s.fund_code, f.fund_name as fund_name, s.total_shares, s.available_shares, s.frozen_shares, s.avg_cost_price, s.total_cost, s.cost_principal, s.last_updated from holdings s inner join fund_base_info f on f.fund_code = s.fund_code inner join user u on u.id = s.user_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into holdings
user_id,
fund_code,
total_shares,
available_shares,
frozen_shares,
avg_cost_price,
total_cost,
cost_principal,
last_updated,

mapper.update:
update holdings
id = #{row.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{row.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_code = #{row.fundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_shares = #{row.totalShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
available_shares = #{row.availableShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
frozen_shares = #{row.frozenShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
avg_cost_price = #{row.avgCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_cost = #{row.totalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_principal = #{row.costPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_updated = #{row.lastUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update holdings set id = #{row.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{row.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_code = #{row.fundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_shares = #{row.totalShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, available_shares = #{row.availableShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, frozen_shares = #{row.frozenShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, avg_cost_price = #{row.avgCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_cost = #{row.totalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_principal = #{row.costPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_updated = #{row.lastUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update holdings
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_code = #{fundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_shares = #{totalShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
available_shares = #{availableShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
frozen_shares = #{frozenShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
avg_cost_price = #{avgCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_cost = #{totalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
cost_principal = #{costPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_updated = #{lastUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update holdings set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_code = #{fundCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_shares = #{totalShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, available_shares = #{availableShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, frozen_shares = #{frozenShares,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, avg_cost_price = #{avgCostPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_cost = #{totalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cost_principal = #{costPrincipal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, last_updated = #{lastUpdated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
